title: Why are there so many stupid polls on this forum?
content:
No really. Why are there so many spam polls in this sub-forum?


Let's look at the more ridiculous of them:

Do you wish you could jump 15 feet?
What would you do with a pole?
What do you think of this [random] song?
Yet another poll
Supermarket
Health insurance~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Re: Why are there so many stupid polls on this forum?
content:
My theory is that there's a finite number of good polls. We don't want to use them all up without cause, so we work through the dumb ones in our spare time.________________
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v462/lemur821/toughyorp.png[/img]

title: Re: Why are there so many stupid polls on this forum?
content:
Or then we've already ran out of the good ones. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Why are there so many stupid polls on this forum?
Re: Why are there so many stupid polls on this forum?
content:
I blame the very existance of this sub-forum actually.

What use is there to be able to either easily view all polls, or easily ignore them completely?
Polls are indicated with a little icon, so it's not that hard to do that anyway.
Maybe it's just the fact that now the polls are grouped together, which brings... uhm... absolutely nothing useful I can think of either.
In my opinion there's no need for loose poll sub-forums.Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]
